languages.text: "Да хранит Бог-Император Лорд-капитана, что вступил{mf|ся|ась} за нас! Еще чуть-чуть и руку сломали бы, семью кормить не смог бы".
"Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."
languages.original_text: "Да хранит Бог-Император Лорд-капитана, что вступил{mf|ся|ась} за нас! Еще чуть-чуть и руку сломали бы, семью кормить не смог бы".

traits.locale_text: "Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."
"Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."
"Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."
"Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."
"Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."

languages.text: “感谢神皇把舰长大人带到了我们身边！是{mf|他|她}救了我们的命！要是{mf|他|她}再晚来一分钟，那些人就会打断我的胳膊，到时候我就没法养家糊口了。”
languages.original_text: "Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."

traits.locale_text: “感谢神皇把舰长大人带到了我们身边！是{mf|他|她}救了我们的命！要是{mf|他|她}再晚来一分钟，那些人就会打断我的胳膊，到时候我就没法养家糊口了。”

languages.text: «¡Gracias al Dios Emperador por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán! ¡Nos ha salvado! Un minuto más y me habrían partido el brazo, y a ver cómo me gano el pan entonces para alimentar a mi familia».
languages.original_text: "Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."

traits.locale_text: «¡Gracias al Dios Emperador por {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán! ¡Nos ha salvado! Un minuto más y me habrían partido el brazo, y a ver cómo me gano el pan entonces para alimentar a mi familia».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下に感謝します！ロード・キャプテンをありがとう！{mf|彼|彼女｝は私たちを救ってくれた！あと1分遅かったら、腕を折られ、家族を養うこともできませんでした」
languages.original_text: "Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下に感謝します！ロード・キャプテンをありがとう！{mf|彼|彼女｝は私たちを救ってくれた！あと1分遅かったら、腕を折られ、家族を養うこともできませんでした」

languages.text: "Ich danke dem Gottimperator für den Lord Captain!" {mf|Er|Sie} hat uns gerettet! Als Nächstes hätten sie mir den Arm gebrochen, dann hätte ich meine Familie nicht mehr versorgen können."
languages.original_text: "Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."

traits.locale_text: "Ich danke dem Gottimperator für den Lord Captain!" {mf|Er|Sie} hat uns gerettet! Als Nächstes hätten sie mir den Arm gebrochen, dann hätte ich meine Familie nicht mehr versorgen können."

languages.text: « Loué soit l'Empereur-Dieu de nous avoir envoyé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ! {mf|Il|Elle} nous a sauvés ! Si vous n'étiez pas {mf|arrivé|arrivée} à temps, ils m'auraient cassé le bras et j'aurais été bien incapable de nourrir ma famille. »
languages.original_text: "Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."

traits.locale_text: « Loué soit l'Empereur-Dieu de nous avoir envoyé {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ! {mf|Il|Elle} nous a sauvés ! Si vous n'étiez pas {mf|arrivé|arrivée} à temps, ils m'auraient cassé le bras et j'aurais été bien incapable de nourrir ma famille. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan için Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun! Hepimizi kurtardı! Bir dakika sonra gelseydi kolumu kırmışlardı. O hâlde ailemin karnını doyuramazdım."
languages.original_text: "Thank the God-Emperor for the Lord Captain! {mf|He|She} saved us! Another minute and they'd have broken my arm, and I'd have been unable to feed my family."
